translations.message.command.admin.help:
===== EusMinerHat: Admin =====
/minerhatadmin status:  Check miner status
/minerhatadmin log:  Fetch miner log
/minerhatadmin start:  Manually start mining
/minerhatadmin stop:  Manually stop mining
/minerhatadmin reload:  Reload plugin

translations.miner.managerNotCreated: §cMinerManager not created. Is the miner policy correctly configured?
translations.miner.autoRestart: The miner will be restarted every %s minute(s)
